title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 

(Amendment) and Variation of Days (Portlaoise and Tullamore) Order 2023. 

This Order shall come into operation on 1st April 2023
text_norm: 1 order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day (portlaoise tullamore) order 2023 order shall come operation 1st april 2023

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 ( S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 ( S.I. No. 5 

of 1961 ), is hereby amended by— 

the substitution at reference number 138 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

“Portlaoise —First, Second, Third and Fourth Tuesday in each month. First, 
Second, Third and Fourth Thursday in each month. Third Friday in each 
month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 207 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

“Tullamore — First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in each month. First, 
Second, Third and Fourth Wednesday in each month. Second Friday in each 
month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”.
text_norm: 2 first schedule district court (areas) order 1961 ( s.i no 5 1961 ) hereby amended by-- substitution reference number 138 matter column (4) following portlaoise --first second third fourth tuesday month first second third fourth thursday month third friday month sitting 10.30 a.m substitution reference number 207 matter column (4) following tullamore -- first second third fourth monday month first second third fourth wednesday month second friday month sitting 10.30 a.m

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I.
text_raw:
3. The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. 

No. 5 of 1961), is hereby amended by— 

 the substitution at reference number 122 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

“Portlaoise —First, Second, Third and Fourth Tuesday in each month. First, 
Second, Third and Fourth Thursday in each month. Third Friday in each 
month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

 the substitution at reference number 177 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

“Tullamore — First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday in each month. First, 
Second, Third and Fourth Wednesday in each month. Second Friday in each 
month. All sittings at 10.30 a.m.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

[122] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
22 March 2023 

PAUL KELLY, 
Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 
documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MAURA HOWE, 
Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [122]

heading: (This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days at Portlaoise and Tullamore. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [122] 5
